definitions.definition: A laxative , either in the form of a medicine or a food such as asparagus or hops , which has the effect of moving the bowels , or aiding digestion and preventing constipation .

main_definition: ( medicine ) A laxative , either in the form of a medicine or a food such as asparagus or hops , which has the effect of moving the bowels , or aiding digestion and preventing constipation .
